name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SheenderellaDay ⧸ ラストに告知アリ！【#⁠星街すいせい6周年記念LIVE】 [i0vqoGF6xFo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Midnight Mission' by Hoshimachi Suisei.
Interlude with clock tower visuals and ticking sounds.
Performance of the song 'fake face dance music' by Hoshimachi Suisei.
Interlude with clock tower visuals and ticking sounds.
Performance of the song 'Mugen Nostalgia' by Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: パパパパッパンクスのバイブスは
subtitles.english: The pa-pa-pa-pa punks' vibes are

subtitles.original: 未だくすぶってるのさ
subtitles.english: still smoldering.

subtitles.original: 流星を待って迎える衝動
subtitles.english: Waiting for a meteor, welcoming the impulse,

subtitles.original: 逆転のラストパス
subtitles.english: the final pass for a comeback.

subtitles.original: カオティックな音に乗せて
subtitles.english: Riding on the chaotic sound,

subtitles.original: 合図して世界を攫うよ
subtitles.english: I'll signal and snatch the world away.

subtitles.original: カーテンコールで錆び付いた脳内を
subtitles.english: My brain, rusted at the curtain call,

subtitles.original: アンロックして
subtitles.english: will be unlocked.

subtitles.original: バイバイバイ 聖の海を泳いで
subtitles.english: Bye bye bye, swimming in the holy sea,

subtitles.original: 僕のフェーズは最高潮
subtitles.english: my phase is at its peak.

subtitles.original: ハイウェイで遊ぼうぜ 走って
subtitles.english: Let's play on the highway, running,

subtitles.original: カオティックな音で踊って
subtitles.english: dancing to the chaotic sound,

subtitles.original: HIGHになるまで
subtitles.english: Until we're HIGH.

subtitles.original: 洒落た夜に 溢れたメロディー
subtitles.english: Overflowing melody on a stylish night,

subtitles.original: 絡まってんのに 愛は解けてゆく
subtitles.english: though it's entangled, love is unraveling.

subtitles.original: いつだってそうに 心配したがってるのに
subtitles.english: It's always like that, even though I want to worry,

subtitles.original: fake face dance music 夜明けまで踊っている
subtitles.english: fake face dance music, dancing until dawn.

subtitles.original:
fake face dance music
作詞・作曲：TAKU INOUE
subtitles.english:
fake face dance music
Lyrics & Composition: TAKU INOUE

subtitles.original: いつだって情緒不安定なことあることも言っちゃってんだ
subtitles.english: I even say that I'm sometimes emotionally unstable,

subtitles.original: 行き場のないこの世界では 稀に見かける愛を信じ続けてる
subtitles.english: in this world with nowhere to go, I keep believing in the rare love I find.

subtitles.original: 朝食かてらのばかばかしい
subtitles.english: The ridiculous

subtitles.original: ニュースで誰かが笑ってた
subtitles.english: breakfast-time news had someone laughing.

subtitles.original: その時からなのか
subtitles.english: Maybe it was from then,

subtitles.original: 知ってる世界じゃなくなっていた
subtitles.english: it was no longer the world I knew.

subtitles.original: 本当に可笑しな人生ね
subtitles.english: It's a truly funny life, isn't it?

subtitles.original: それでも拝した運命で
subtitles.english: Even so, with the fate I bowed to,

subtitles.original: あなたにこの心 拝借された
subtitles.english: my heart was borrowed by you.

subtitles.original: 晴れたテンポに 跳ねたメロディ
subtitles.english: A bouncing melody to a sunny tempo,

subtitles.original: 重ねてるのに 愛は解けてゆく
subtitles.english: is layered, but love is unraveling.

subtitles.original: いつだって worry 心配しちゃってるふり
subtitles.english: Always worry, pretending to be worried,

subtitles.original: うわついた心まで 正当化しちゃうんだ learn
subtitles.english: I even justify my fickle heart, learn.

subtitles.original: そもしちゃなかった愛を見つけて
subtitles.english: I found a love that wasn't there before,

subtitles.original: これが本当の幸せなんだろうなとか思ったり
subtitles.english: and I thought, 'This must be true happiness,'

subtitles.original: 可愛くなるため頑張ったり そのたびフラッシュバックバック浴びて
subtitles.english: working hard to be cute, and each time being bathed in flash-back-backs,

subtitles.original: 常に絶望感に迫られても 守るとか君しか見てないとか言われても
subtitles.english: even if I'm constantly pressed by despair, even if I'm told 'I'll protect you' or 'I'm only looking at you,'

subtitles.original: 真実味ないな
subtitles.english: it doesn't sound true.

subtitles.original: 呼びかけてるのにあの子に夢中で
subtitles.english: Even though I'm calling out, you're obsessed with that girl,

subtitles.original: 絡まってんのに愛がすり抜けいく
subtitles.english: it's entangled, but love is slipping away.

subtitles.original: チクタクチクタクと流れていく時の針だけが
subtitles.english: Tick-tock, tick-tock, only the hands of time flow on,

subtitles.original: おいてかないでね おいて
subtitles.english: don't leave me behind, leave me.

subtitles.original: 本当は言いたそう相思相愛 現実的には期待を背負んで
subtitles.english: I actually want to say we're mutually in love, but realistically I shoulder expectations,

subtitles.original: バッドなエンディング 狂うのもそっちのタイミング
subtitles.english: a bad ending, it's also your timing to go crazy.

subtitles.original: 純愛なんてさ 信じてたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I believed in things like pure love,

subtitles.original: 本命じゃなくて 浮気女は笑
subtitles.english: I'm not the one, the cheating woman laughs (lol).

subtitles.original: 洒落た夜に 溢れたメロディー
subtitles.english: In a stylish night, an overflowing melody,

subtitles.original: 絡まってんのに 愛は解けてゆく
subtitles.english: is entangled, but love is unraveling.

subtitles.original: シンデレラストーリー 到底違ってるのに
subtitles.english: A Cinderella story, though it's completely different,

subtitles.original: fake face dance music 嘘まみれに踊ろう
subtitles.english: fake face dance music, let's dance covered in lies.

subtitles.original:
無限ノスタルジー
作詞・作曲：分島花音 / 編曲：千葉"nuts"直樹
subtitles.english:
Mugen Nostalgia
Lyrics & Composition: Kanon Wakeshima / Arrangement: Naoki "nuts" Chiba

subtitles.original: オレンジの太陽 追いかけてきたの
subtitles.english: I've been chasing the orange sun.

subtitles.original: 手の中にあるのは 赤いビー玉
subtitles.english: What's in my hand is a red glass marble.

subtitles.original: ねぇ あとちょっとだけね それが言いたくて
subtitles.english: Hey, just a little bit more, I wanted to say that,

subtitles.original: 名残サンダル かかと鳴らす
subtitles.english: lingering sandals, clicking my heels.

subtitles.original: いついつまでも 一人で歩くもん
subtitles.english: I'll walk alone forever and ever.

subtitles.original: くるくる回って すり抜けいく
subtitles.english: Spinning round and round, slipping through.

subtitles.original: どこどこまでも 寂しくさせるのよ
subtitles.english: It makes me feel lonely no matter where I go.

subtitles.original: クスクス笑って 雲の上に居る
subtitles.english: Giggling, I'm above the clouds.

subtitles.original: 君にもう一度 会いたくて
subtitles.english: I want to see you once more.
